amendment.description: To convey clear information in graphic form about projected deficits.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 596 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 596 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Johnson. (consideration: CR S1980-1981; text: CR S1981) To convey clear information in graphic form about projected deficits.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 596 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Johnson.
